title: How to Make Baked Rice Pudding

steps.headline: Place ingredients in an ungreased 1 1/2 quart round casserole.
steps.description: Mix together thoroughly. It would be a good idea to use a whisker to ensure that the eggs are well incorporated into all of the other ingredients because it is what thickens everything.

steps.headline: Set casserole in a pie pan of hot water.
Place the set of pans in oven for 45 minutes.
steps.description: Mixture will be set around the edge.

text: Set oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Place ingredients in an ungreased 1 1/2 quart round casserole. Mix together thoroughly. It would be a good idea to use a whisker to ensure that the eggs are well incorporated into all of the other ingredients because it is what thickens everything. Set casserole in a pie pan of hot water.  Place the set of pans in oven for 45 minutes. Mixture will be set around the edge. Remove from oven.  Stir gently.  Cool 1/2 hour without stirring. Serve warm or cold. Finished.
